title: Borderless Mac Issues
body: Mac Borderless still does not cover the entire screen. However, there was an interesting case where it did fill the screen upon having the computer full with memory (resetting all the settings in-game). Could be a solution or part of the solution Riot could be looking for.

replies.body: That's an interesting case, and we'd like to take a closer look.  Is your resolution in-game different than your actual screen?  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can look into this with you and find some options.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
